emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Autonomous Development Platforms
emerging_technologies.description: Platforms where AI not only assists but autonomously designs, codes, tests, and deploys software applications, integrating with existing development tools.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces the entry barriers for software development, potentially leading to widespread automation in the tech sector but also raising concerns about job displacement and intellectual property.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will depend on the reliability of AI in complex projects, trust in AI decision-making, and integration with existing enterprise software development practices.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Resistant Cryptography
emerging_technologies.description: Development of encryption methods that are secure against quantum computing attacks, ensuring long-term data protection.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Ensures continuity and security of digital transactions and communications in the face of quantum computing threats.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Will be driven by regulatory mandates, the rise in quantum computing capabilities, and the need to protect sensitive data over long periods.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural-Enhanced Interfaces
emerging_technologies.description: Advanced brain-computer interfaces that allow for direct control of devices or communication through thought, enhancing human capabilities.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize how we interact with technology, improve quality of life for those with disabilities, but also poses ethical questions about privacy and autonomy.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires breakthroughs in non-invasive neural technology, public acceptance of brain interface technology, and robust ethical frameworks.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Pair Programming
mainstream_technologies.description: AI systems that work alongside human developers to write, review, and debug code in real-time, enhancing productivity and code quality.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech companies, integrated into development environments, and recognized for improving coding efficiency and reducing errors.

mainstream_technologies.name: Urban Autonomous Transport
mainstream_technologies.description: Autonomous vehicles, including buses, taxis, and delivery vehicles, becoming a common sight in urban environments.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: High adoption rate in cities, supported by regulatory frameworks, infrastructure, and public acceptance of autonomous transport.

epoch_themes.description: AI's role evolves from an assistant to a co-creator in software and content creation, reshaping how work is done in creative and technical fields.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shifts in job roles towards oversight, strategy, and complex problem-solving rather than routine tasks.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global increase in productivity, potential reduction in work hours, and new forms of human-AI collaboration.

epoch_themes.description: Technology focused on making urban environments more livable through autonomous systems, sustainable energy, and smart infrastructure.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Enhances quality of life, reduces urban congestion and pollution, promotes sustainable living practices.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Growth in smart city initiatives, increased investment in green technologies, and urban planning that incorporates technology for sustainability.
